meeting_info.organization: City of Dallas Public Facility Corporation Board of Directors
meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Council Briefing Room 6ES and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the minutes of August 22, 2023 Board Meeting

agenda_items.title: Santa Fe Trail Term Sheet
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet for Santa Fe Trail at Haskell in partnership with Larkspur Capital, LP to be located at 400 Ash Lane, Dallas, TX
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: The Riviera Apartments Financing
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution authorizing the negotiation and execution of a Term Sheet and inducing the proposed financing of up to $55,000,000 of tax-exempt bonds for The Riviera Apartments in partnership with Savoy and AIDS Services of Dallas to be located at 11700 Audelia Rd., Dallas, TX
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Banyan Flats Transaction
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Banyan Flats located at 2020 N Beckley Ave, Dallas TX; including the execution of all documentation necessary to carry out the transactions; authorizing the purchase of the land for the projects; and other matters in connection therewith
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Maple Highline Transaction
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Maple Highline located at 5908 Maple Ave., Dallas TX; including the execution of all documentation necessary to carry out the transactions; authorizing the purchase of the land for the projects; and other matters in connection therewith
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Bishop 8 Transaction
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Bishop 8 located at 505 & 510 W. 8 St., Dallas TX; including the execution of all documentation necessary to carry out the transactions; authorizing the purchase of the land for the projects and authorizing the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to serve as the general contractor; and other matters in connection therewith
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Coombs Creek Alta Vista Transaction
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of a resolution approving the transaction for Coombs Creek Alta Vista located at 3400 W Illinois Ave, Dallas TX; including the execution of all documentation necessary to carry out the transactions; authorizing the purchase of the land for the projects and authorizing the Dallas Public Facility Corporation to serve as the general contractor; and other matters in connection therewith
agenda_items.presenter: Aaron Eaquinto/Albert Gonzalez, HOU Staff; Jim Plummer, Bracewell; Tim Nelson, Hilltop Securities

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Treasurer’s Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas PFC Treasurer’s Report

agenda_items.title: Dallas PFC Pipeline Report
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of Dallas PFC Pipeline Report

financial_items.description: Financing of tax-exempt bonds for The Riviera Apartments
